MICHIGAN STATE UNIVERSITY east lansing
TELEVISION STATION WMSB
December 28, 1959
Mr. Sam Becker
Director of Television
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam,
This is to inform yon that shortly after the first of the year
my business address will be as follows: University of California
MMical Center, San Francisco 22, California. I have accepted a
position there as research professor and will be in charge of
establishing, operating, and researching a closed-circuit system
which is expected to include color and a video tape recorder
within three years.
Actually, the general nature of my job will not be greatly changed
inasmuch as I will also be doing research on programs to the general
public prepared by the Medical Center as well as instruction via
closed-circuit. I am still interested in maintaining my affiliation
with the UAEB and do not see where my new duties will prevent my
remaining a member of the Research Committee if the Association can
make use of my services. I have not made much public announcement
about this decision, which I reached back in October. I assume the
University of California will make some formal announcement shortly
after I arrive. However, I am not in any way trying to keep it any
secretâ€¢
Best wishes to you for a joyous holiday season and a happy and
successful I960.
IRM/ee
cc: Mr. Harry Skornia
Urbana, Illinois
